Game.Name: Uno Free Fall (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: America's favorite card game returns in an all-new format for your Game Boy? Advance system! "UNO Freefall" is a new twist on an old classic! Six animated themed backgrounds provide the backdrop for more exciting and fast-paced UNO? fun! Challenge yourself in four different game modes, or take on the computer in Classic, Flippy, Perfect Match or Timed modes!http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/933468.html
Game.Notes: A collection of three classic card games -- Uno, Uno Freefall, and Skip-Bo
